title: American horror story freak show - petites back story 4x10 orphans
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: This melted my heart, and when Pepper saw Ma Petite it just made me warm inside.
Petite is so adorable I kinda got mad and sad of her death 😢😠😢
If I'm not wrong, they got the actual shortest woman in the world for the part? Damn.
that's a dr. Pepper commercial you don't see everyday

That music towards the end of the video is so beautiful it brings me to tears because as elsa kneels down to pick petite up, Petite's indian attire in that light looks so beautiful, and there's so much vulnerability. Elsa may have down horrible things but I'm still glad they showed her kinder side. This episode was my favourite hands down
description:
American horror story freak show - how petite got to the freak show and met pepper  
4x9 orphans
